reviewText: First off.  This is not a porno/ film.  No explicit camera angles.  Rated "R".  It brings out 3 narrators in doctor-status.  Middle couples perform foreplay and love-making positions.  The main theme is to push up the sexual drive before and during intimacy.  Information OR educational nature for adults.

This video turned out to be better than I expected. It shows four attractive couples demonstrating in explicit detail foreplay, erotic massage, oral sex, and everything else leading to intercourse.

All the sex scenes were great and explicit, especially toward the end. The sex scenes also seem more x rated than the usual sex educated film.  The scenes also show the couples go all the way until they climax at the end which I liked. Not many sex educational films show couples climaxing at the end.

Kama Sutra is a great series.
